experience.heading: Dr. Ashwin Gopinath, MIT, USA
experience.content: Working on 2 different AI based projects; AI model to classify Malarial parasites on a blood smear and Generative Adver-sarial Network(GAN) based image generation for generating blood smear microscopic image data sets for training other models.

experience.heading: Surface Engineering Group
experience.content: Continued the research on TBC’s for turbine blades; characterized the mechanical and tribological properties of plasma coated Stainless steel(SS) samples. Characterized the TBC’s thermal resistance and oxidation properties. *Paper currently under review.

experience.heading: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL)
experience.content: Investigated the use of solid waste products generated during Steelmaking(LD SLudge) for TBC’s. Characterized the LD Sludge chemical composition, developed a beneficiation route for sludge and optimized the process parameters for plasma coating of L.D. Sludge powder on AISI 304 SS.

experience.heading: Inorganic Chemistry Group
experience.content: Synthesis and characterization of Graphene oxide nanoparticles for wastewater filtration. Surveyed water quality and investigated the presence of heavy metals in local ground/drinking water.
